entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
